pages.title: Axolotl
pages.text: An axolotl is a passive bucketable aquatic mob found in lush caves that also kills, but it only kills fish, not any players. The Axolotl can also assist players with aquatic combat and grant them Regeneration.$(br)$(l)Health:$() 14 (7 hearts)$(br)$(l)Behaviour:$() Passive
